title: Passed
author: Lord Rikath
citation: Lord Rikath. "Passed: experience with DXM & Drug Testing (ID 44474)". Erowid.org. Jun 21, 2007. erowid.org/exp/44474
footer:

report: I'm on probation. I get drug tested regularly and was nervous when it came to DXM because I have heard it can cause false positives. One night I personally ingested around 200 mg of DXM to catch a buzz. Little did I know I was to be drug tested the very next MORNING!!! The result of 100% clean surprised me, and I was very pleased.
